message: Let's start fair. You get 10%, I get 90%.
You got lucky last round, but I'm not going to let you have it all this time!
Let's be reasonable.  I'll take a bit less, but I need more than 200k.  Let's find a middle ground.
You're still being too generous with the 80% share. I'm willing to take a bit less, but you need to meet me halfway!
Okay, I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's split it 70/30.  We can't let this money disappear!
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take all the risk of the remaining rounds!
